autoSequenceAndAscent: const eventDownlink = new BroadcastChannel('downlink_event');OV.software.missionMode = 'auto-sequence';setTimeout(() => {OV.computers.programHandler.exec('SSMEstartUp', OV.computers.gpc1);console.log('T+15s: SSME start command sent');}, 24400);setTimeout(() => {if (OV.ssmeHandler.ctr.getThrust() > 90) {console.log('T+30s: Thrust OK');setTimeout(() => {OV.software.missionMode = 'ascent';OV.srbHandler.ignite()}, 1000);} else {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdThrust(0);console.log('T+30s: Thrust too low, engines cut');eventDownlink.postMessage(2791);eventDownlink.postMessage(2792);}}, 30000);
ascentHandler: console.log(OV.mission.met);switch(OV.mission.met) {case 1: OV.software.missionMode = 'ascent';break;  case 4: OV.computers.programHandler.exec('SSMEfull-throttleUp', OV.computers.gpc4);break;  case 10: OV.computers.programHandler.exec('roll-ses4', OV.computers.gpc1);console.log('T+41s: Roll maneuver command sent');break;  case 31: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 75, roll: -180, yaw: 119});break;  case 33: OV.computers.programHandler.exec('SSMEmaxQ-throttleDown', OV.computers.gpc1);console.log('T+64s: Max-Q throttle down command sent');break;  case 47: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 70, roll: -180, yaw: 119});break;  case 48: OV.computers.programHandler.exec('SSMEfull-throttleUp', OV.computers.gpc4);break;  case 61: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 67.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 75: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 65, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 82: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 62.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 90: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 60, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 105: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 57.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 120: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 55, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 125: OV.srbHandler.seperate();break;  case 130: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 55, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 135: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 52.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 150: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 50, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 165: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 45, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 180: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 40, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 195: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 37.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 210: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 35, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 225: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 32.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 240: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 30, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 255: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 27.5, roll: -180, yaw:119});break;  case 345: OV.computers.maneuverHandlerTool.maneuverTo({pitch: 20, roll: 0, yaw:119});break;  case 442: OV.computers.programHandler.exec('SSME-3g-limiter-sequence', OV.computers.gpc2);break;         case 505: OV.computers.programHandler.exec('SSMEshutDown', OV.computers.gpc1);const imu_cmd = new BroadcastChannel('imu_cmd');imu_cmd.postMessage(['local',119]);break;  case 525: OV.et.seperate();OV.software.missionMode = 'subOrb-ascent';break;}
SSME-gimbal-test: const eventDownlink = new BroadcastChannel('downlink_event'); OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([0, 10]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([0, -10]);setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([0, 0]);setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([10, 0]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([-10, 0]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([0, 0]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([10, 10]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([-10, -10]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([10, -10]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([-10, 10]); setTimeout(() => {OV.ssmeHandler.cmdPos([0, 5]); eventDownlink.postMessage(466);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);}, 5000);
